titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 5-year recovery period for computer-based gambling machines.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/28/2010--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to classify any computer-based gambling machine, including slot machines and video lottery terminals, as five-year property for depreciation purposes.
